name: Definitely Not A Pyramid Scheme
description:
Its really not a PYRAMID SCHEME at all!

Update:

Instructions:
WASD = move direction
Collect the green tokens while avoiding collisions or crashing down. When a green suspicious shape appears you can pull out by touching it to get to the...
Place Phase:
Use your mouse to place the suspicious shapes to pave more ground to move around.
No pyramid schemes here! Everyone wins!
